p: Essential oil (EO) is a kind of natural product found in the roots, stems, leaves, flowers, and fruit peels of aromatic plants. It is mainly composed of terpenes, alcohols, aldehydes, ketones, acids, and esters [ 5]. Citrus EO is a kind of widely used plant EO, which is mainly rich in fruit peel. Studies have reported that citrus EOs have a variety of biological activities, including antioxidant, bacteriostatic, anti-inflammatory, anticancer, and insecticidal activities [ 6, 7, 8, 9, 10]. Sahay [ 11] reviewed the pharmacological effects of EOs which have antibacterial and anticancer activities. EOs have little toxicity and few side effects, and are generally recognized as safe in food, and may become new natural resources for the chemoprevention of cancer [ 12, 13].
